mn97:27.6: Yena cayasma sariputto tenupasankama; upasankamitva mama vacanena ayasmato sariputtassa pade sirasa vandahi:
mn97:27.8: So ayasmato sariputtassa pade sirasa vandati’ti.

mn97:28.2: “kacci te, dhananjani, khamaniyam, kacci yapaniyam? Kacci dukkha vedana patikkamanti, no abhikkamanti? Patikkamosanam pannayati, no abhikkamo”ti?

mn97:38.4: “Kim pana tvam, sariputta, dhananjanim brahmanam sati uttarikaraniye hine brahmaloke patitthapetva utthayasana pakkanto”ti?
mn97:38.6: ‘ime kho brahmana brahmalokadhimutta, yannunaham dhananjanissa brahmanassa brahmanam sahabyataya maggam deseyyan’”ti.
mn97:38.7: “Kalankato ca, sariputta, dhananjani brahmano, brahmalokanca upapanno”ti.
